Translations.Text: Ndarahiye k’unyenyeri zikorotse
Yuko umuntu wanyu atazimiye canke atakosheje
Kandi ntavuga amajambo k’ugushaka kwiwe
Ntivyari kuba ibi vyose avuga atari uko ari ubutumwa bw’Imana yahawe
Yaramwigishije uwufise inguvu nyinshi cane
Uwufise ububasha nawe afise uburinganire bukwiye
Nawe akaba ari mukirere c’ukubona ibiri hejuru cane
Hanyuma aregera n’ukumanuka
Guca kuba ubube bw’abo bwo hafi nk’umuheto n ’uwundi biri hafi cane
Ica imwereka uyo mukozi wiwe kuvyo yeretswe
Umutima ntiwabeshe kuvyo wabonye
Mbega muharira nawe kubintu yibonera
Yaramubonye ubugira kabiri kw’imanuka ryiwe
Kugiti c’amaherezo ryayo kiriho
Hafi yaho niho hari uwo murima uzovyagira mwo abantu beranda
Mugihe capfuka ico giti nica gipfuse
Ijisho naryo ntirya buragijwe canke ntiryarenze akarimbi
Mu	vy’ukuri	yarabonye	ibintu	bikuru	bikuru	mu	bimenyetso vy’Umuremyi wiwe
Mbega mwarabonye uwitwa Laata hamwe na Uzzaa
Hamwe n’uwitwa Manaata agira gatatu
Mbega	mwebwe	murafise	ibibondo	vy’abahungu	nayo	ikaba	ifise ibibondo vy’abakobwa
Iryo n’igabanganywa ry’ubuhemu gusa

Ntivyari kuba ibi vyose atari uko ari amazina gusa mwabahaye mwebwe hamwe n’abavyeyi banyu, Imana rero ntiyamanuye ibimenyetso kuri ivyo kuko badakurikiza atari ivyo bikeka ko nivyo imitima yabo yipfuza, mu vy’ukuri uburokoke bwabashikiye buvuye kumuremyi wabo
Mbega umuntu yoshobora kuronka ico yipfuza cose
Ni ivy’Imana gusa haba k’umusi w’imperuka no kw’Isi
